abstract: Herman Cain was the sole candidate to address several hundred activists, many of them Ron Paul supporters, and many highly participatory.
snippet: Herman Cain was the sole candidate to address several hundred activists, many of them Ron Paul supporters, and many highly participatory.
lead_paragraph: TUSCALOOSA, Ala. - Maybe you've heard: there was another obscure straw poll held in America, and a legion of well-organized Ron Paul supporters turned out.

headline.main: Speechmaking Call and Response at Alabama Straw Poll
